Package com.betfair.cougar.api.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Credential  
    Identity
    An Identity represents both the resolved principal (the actual identity) and the credentials that were used to resolve that principal.
    IdentityChain
    A chain of Identities that together form the chain of trust that has authenticated the identity.
    IdentityResolver
    The IdentityResolver resolves a set of credentials into an IdentityChain.
    IdentityTokenResolver<I,O,C>
    Base credential resolver interface.
    InferredCountryResolver<I>
    This interface describes an implementation that should be used to infer a country from an input source
    TransportInfo  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IdentityToken
    An identity token read
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CredentialFaultCode
    Enum containing a subset of the com.betfair.cougar.core.api.exception.ServerFaultCode enum Used to specify a custom fault code to return in an InvalidCredentialsException (As ServerFaultCode is not visible in this package) All CredentialFaultCodes must map 1-1 to a ServerFaultCode
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidCredentialsException
    Exception to be thrown when an IdentityResolver can't resolve credentials into an identity (for example because the credentials are not valid).
